archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.3.7b: b) reviewing them to verify they have been reviewed and applied correctly (e.g. any maximum number of users or devices permitted within the licence has not been exceeded)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
